name: Schools Out
description:
You are a depressed grumpy substitute bus driver who needs help from an experienced veteran of the bus industry getting the kids home to the right houses, can you do it? This Oculus VR game is about getting the kids on your bus home using teamwork.

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Virtual Reality platform

Technology Notes: 
Only tested on the Oculus Rift.

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product), Virtual reality head mount display (Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, etc.)

Credits: 

Alexander Sierputowski - Artist & Sound

Brian Gesler - Programmer

Christian Kapper - Programmer

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/schools-out
